name: Glint Coin
description: Glint Coin (GLINT) is a utility token from TON Diamonds, a curated NFT Marketplace for digital artists on TON Blockchain. Glint Coin (GLINT) enhances the TON Diamonds user experience in the following ways: — Purchasing NFT on TON Diamonds marketplace with Glint Coin. — Covering NFT trading fees on the TON Diamonds marketplace. — Granting DAO voting rights to decide on the listing of new or other NFT collections and artists on the marketplace.
